overview: Dody Iskandar, Abdul Karim, and Taufik Zulfikri are three blind individuals with different levels of visual impairment. All three have a passion for watching and producing films, and express this passion by watching films, producing films independently, and playing an active role as participants in Inklusi Film Indonesia (INFI), a community for individuals with disabilities to produce and enjoy films.
title: End of the Tunnel
